channel.title: Songs on ZJeapo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Songs on ZJeapo's Blog

item.title: I‘m Yours
item.description: “I’m Yours” lyrics Jason Mraz Lyrics “I’m Yours” Well, you done done me and you bet I felt it I tried to be chill, but you’re so hot that I melted I fell right through the cracks Now I’m trying to get back Before the cool done run out I’ll be giving it my bestest And nothing’s gonna stop me but divine intervention I reckon, it’s again my turn

item.title: Shape of you
item.description: Here is the tutorial 《Shape Of You》全网最细2.0整首英文歌教唱 Here is a MV 【MV】黄老板新单-《Shape Of You》中英字幕 [Verse 1] A club isn’t the best place to find a lover So the bar is where I go (Mm) Me and my friends at the table doin’ shots Drinkin’ fast and then we talk slow (Mm) And you come over and start up a conversation with just me And trust me, I’ll give it a chance now (Mm)
